body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jeremy Alexander and the customer's name is Frances Edwards.  The conversation is about a random business (a Mini Golf Course ) and is a conversation about typical situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling XYZ Financial Services. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I'm having some issues with my account and need some assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help you with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely, it's two three four five six seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. For security purposes, can you also confirm the last four digits of your Social Security Number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information. I have verified your account. How can I assist you further today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble accessing my online banking account. I think I forgot my password.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help with that. I will reset your password and send a temporary one to your registered email address. Will that work for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that would be perfect. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. I have sent the temporary password to your email. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all I needed. Thanks for your help, John.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sarah. Have a great day!
